summary: An asocial, obese German woman lives in a large city. Unfortunately despite her kind and intelligent personality, she has had a lot of trouble making a connection with people, until she gets a crush on a handsome subway conductor.
cast: Marianne Sägebrecht|Eisi Gulp|Toni Berger|Manuela Denz|Will Spindler|Hans Stadlbauer|Meret Burger|Werner Zeussel|Christiane Blumhoff|Dietrich Kerky|Peter Weiß|Michele Tichawsky|Paul Würges
keywords: male rear nudity|subway|morbid obesity|one word title|train
title: Sugarbaby
